TextOption.label: Frequency
TextOption.Description: Specify the global design frequency(in MHz). By default auto constraints is enabled.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Use Clock Period for Unconstrainted IO
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Determine whether default constraints are used for I/O ports that do not have user-defined constraints.

IntegerOption.label: Fanout Guide
IntegerOption.Description: Set the guideline for fanout-based optimizations such as replication.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Disable I/O Insertion
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Enable/disable I/O insertion.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Update Compile Point Timing Data
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Determine whether or not changes inside a compile point can cause the compile point (or top-level) containing it to change accordingly.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Read Write Check on RAM
SingleChoiceOption.Description: If read or write conflicts exist for the RAM, enable this option to insert bypass logic around the RAM to prevent simulation mismatch. Disabling this option does not generate bypass logic.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Annotated Properties for Analyst
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Enable/disable the annotation of certain generated properties relating to clocks and expansion onto the RTL view.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Resolve Mixed Drivers
SingleChoiceOption.Description: When a net is driven by a VCC or GND and active drivers, enable this option to connect the net to the VCC or GND driver.

SingleChoiceOption.label: FSM Compiler
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Enable/disable the FSM compiler. Control the use of FSM synthesis for state machines.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Resource Sharing
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Use resource sharing during synthesis.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Pipelining
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Run designs at a faster frequency by moving registers into the multiplier, creating pipeline stages.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Retiming
SingleChoiceOption.Description: When enabled(true), registers may be moved into combinational logic to improve performance.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Write Vendor Constraint File
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Write vendor-specific constraint files.

TextOption.label: Number of Critical Paths
TextOption.Description: Specifiy the number of critical paths to report in the timing report.

TextOption.label: Number of Start/End Points
TextOption.Description: Specify the number of start and end points to include when reporting paths with the worst slack in the timing report.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Verilog Language
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Specify Verilog standard.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Push Tristates
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Enable/Disable the push of tristates across process/block boundaries.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Allow Duplicate Modules
SingleChoiceOption.Description: For Verilog designs, allow the use of duplicate module names. When true, the last definition of the module is used by the software and any previous definitions are ignored.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Multiple File Compilation Unit
SingleChoiceOption.Description: When you enable the Multiple File Compilation Unit switch, the Verilog compiler uses the compilation unit for modules defined in multiple files.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Beta Features for Verilog
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Enable/disable the use of Verilog compiler beta features.

IntegerOption.label: Loop Limit
IntegerOption.Description: Allow you to override the default compiler loop limit value of 2000 in the RTL.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Synthesis On/Off Implemented as Translate On/Off
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Determine whether code between synthesis on/off directives is ignored.

SingleChoiceOption.label: VHDL 2008
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Enable the use of VHDL 2008 language standards.

SingleChoiceOption.label: VHDL 2019
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Enable the use of VHDL 2019 language standards.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Implicit Initial Value Support
SingleChoiceOption.Description: When enabled, the compiler passes init values through a syn_init property to the mapper.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Beta Features for VHDL
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Enable/disable the use of VHDL compiler beta features.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Default Enum Encoding
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Set the default for enumerated types.(VHDL only)

SingleChoiceOption.label: Clock Conversion
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Perform gated and generated clock optimization when enabled.
